mapper.select: select bxy.*,count(d.id) 'commentCount' from (select b.*,u.user_name,u.id 'userId',s.sort_title,s.id 'sid' from bxy_blog.blog b,bxy_blog.user u,bxy_blog.sort s where b.user_id = u.id and b.sort_id = s.id and b.blog_level = #{level} and b.blog_status = 1 and b.is_top = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC) bxy left join bxy_blog.discuss d on bxy.id = d.blog_id group by bxy.id
